abstract: Bank of America Merrill Lynch has hired Luigi Rizzo from Goldman Sachs to become head of mergers and acquisitions for Europe, the Middle East and Africa.
snippet: Bank of America Merrill Lynch has hired Luigi Rizzo from Goldman Sachs to become head of mergers and acquisitions for Europe, the Middle East and Africa.
lead_paragraph: LONDON – Bank of America Merrill Lynch said on Wednesday that it had hired Luigi Rizzo from Goldman Sachs to become head of mergers and acquisitions for Europe, the Middle East and Africa.

headline.main: Bank of America Hires Goldman M.&A. Executive
